Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute near State/Illinois
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses rrted EB: Illinois, LaSalle, Chgo, Fairbanks, & Illinois; WB: Grand, Fairbanks, Chgo, LaSalle, & Grand due to street blockage nr State/Illinois.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near State/Illinois.

Eastbound buses will operate via Illinois, LaSalle, Chicago, Fairbanks, and Illinois.

Westbound buses will operate via Grand, Fairbanks, Chicago, LaSalle, and Grand.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem at Harlem (FP Branch). Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier signal problem at Harlem (FP Branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
